issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: I noticed two code blocks that can be improved in ContainersMonitorImpl.java.  cpuUsagePercentPerCoreByAllContainers and cpuUsageTotalCoresByAllContainers track the same value and CHANGE_MONITORING_CONTAINER_RESOURCE is checked twice along with two calls to changeContainerResource.
fields.summary: Code can be improved in ContainersMonitorImpl.java

Thanks for the patch, [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com].  A couple of minor comments:

You only partially deleted the comment about example 6 machines, so it's left with a dangling "and".

Also, you copied the comment further down in the code, so (at least part of) it is in their twice.  Did you mean to move it instead?
Good point [~templedf]. I meant to keep both, because the first one describes cpuUsagePercentPerCore in both places.
